original_text: Now the wind has blown all the clouds away. The sun shines brightly in the sky. It is too bright for us to look at. Now the wind has blown all the clouds away. The sun shines brightly in the sky. It is too bright for us to look at. Now the wind has blown all the clouds away. The sun shines brightly in the sky. It is too bright for us to look at. Now the wind has blown all the clouds away.
korean_text: 그런즉 바람이 불어 하늘이 말끔하게 되었을 때 그 밝은 빛을 아무도 볼 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Now the wind has blown all the clouds away.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 바람이 모든 구름을 날려 보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: The sun shines brightly in the sky.
It is too bright for us to look at.
sentences.korean_translation: 너무 밝아서 우리가 볼 수 없습니다.
